Thief.goal: For one reason or another, you're looking to steal something expensive today, and you've found a good target.

Hoarder.goal: You have a pretty bad hoarding problem. But you have a real bad feeling about today, and you need to set up a stash for when it all goes down.

Black Market Outfitter.goal: You've tapped into the black market, and it turns out you could get rich quick introducing some of Nanotrasen's guns to the dark web!

Organ Market Collector.goal: Nanotrasen has top of the line medical resources handy, which means you could be making a pretty penny slipping some organs out of medical.
